name: HEAVEN'S YOLK
description:
saigo no ran decides they will be the last of their dynasty, fleeing an arranged marriage into the hotaru mori, the forest of fireflies. there they meet a river dragon with a flair for the dramatic and an obsession with honesty who calls herself luoyue. as two who were raised to be prey, both of them must learn from each other how to hunt.

there is no such thing as good and evil. 
there is only the power of living things. 

RELEASED EPISODICALLY: 

  • updates are done when they're done, but it'll usually be within a week
  • follow my itch for email notifications
  • this is a companion story about the same (luo)yue from LYCHEE SEED, so listen/read that for the full experience
  • for fans of OCHITSUBAKI, saigo no ran is lun kochouran's ancestor
